Data type: `String[1]`



Default value: `'mail -s "[rkhunter] Warnings found for ${HOST_NAME}"'`

### <a name="rkhunter--cron"></a>`rkhunter::cron`

The rkhunter::cron class.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `rkhunter::cron` class:

* [`hour`](#-rkhunter--cron--hour)
* [`weekday`](#-rkhunter--cron--weekday)
* [`email`](#-rkhunter--cron--email)
* [`log_output`](#-rkhunter--cron--log_output)

##### <a name="-rkhunter--cron--hour"></a>`hour`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'4'`

##### <a name="-rkhunter--cron--weekday"></a>`weekday`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'*'`

##### <a name="-rkhunter--cron--email"></a>`email`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'root@localhost'`

##### <a name="-rkhunter--cron--log_output"></a>`log_output`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'> /var/log/rkhunter_warnings.log'`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'2'`

##### <a name="-rkhunter--cron_updatedb--weekday"></a>`weekday`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'1'`

##### <a name="-rkhunter--cron_updatedb--email"></a>`email`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'root@localhost'`

## Data types

### <a name="Rkhunter--Language"></a>`Rkhunter::Language`

A type for the supported rkhunter languages

Alias of `Enum['cn', 'de', 'en', 'ja', 'tr', 'tr.utf8', 'zh', 'zh.utf8']`
